title: Virtual Assistant – Home Care & Adult Day Program Operations
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly experienced and motivated Virtual Assistant to help lead the operations, development, and growth of our home care agency and CAG (Community Access Group) program in Georgia. The ideal candidate will have multiple years of hands-on experience in the home care industry, a strong background in administration and nursing, and a working knowledge of Georgia’s waiver programs, especially for adult day services.

This is a remote, full-time position (40 hours/week) with significant growth potential for the right candidate who can take initiative, scale systems, and bring structure to a fast-growing agency.
